name: Princess Beauty Makeup Salon - Girls Game
name_original: Princess Beauty Makeup Salon - Girls Game
description:
Princess Beauty Makeup Salon is a Free girls makeup game!
Every girl loves Makeover,
Come to makeover and dress up the girl, and let her become the most beautiful one！
It's a kids games for girls! Work your fashion style magic in your very own beauty salon with Princess Makeover, a makeup and dress up game made just for girls.

Let's Enjoy our new game for the kids girls and it is the lattest and much loved concept of makeup , dressup and salon games.You can select your favorite model and give your pink princess & prepare her for an awesome makeover.You need to look perfect for the castle ball, and they need your salon's help to go from messy to impressive!.every beauty princess knows, a good design starts with a cute outfit. Dresses, skirts, shoes, jewelry and accessories are all available in your beauty salon

Makeup your princess with the Beautyful dresses , hair , eyeshadow , eyelance , shoes , neckless , bresslet , etc makeup kit with the Princess Beauty Makeup Salon .Confusing about lipstick color and skin color? Princess Fashion Salon is a paradise of makeup! Makeup like a princess !.Pick out the perfect hairstyle and you're ready for the castle party!

Features :-

- Spa Section
- makeup Section
- dress up Section
- Back Spa Section


- Choose a beautiful girl you like
- The one-stop girls makeover: shampoo, hair steamer, facial Spa
- Cosmetics and decorative items
- Dressed well, take photos with colorful backgrounds

The first scene includes the Spa treatment, so give your princess the best spa treatment. You can give your princess a spa treatment that includes cleaning pimples, threading eye brows, face scrub, hair wash, face wash & steamer.After your beautiful frozen princess is done with the spa treatment, give her the best makeover to make her look special and amazing .Celebrity go to the spa for the wedding that make her fresh, beautiful and charming.Pick and choose the fashions you like, the more beautiful the better, then dress your model as quickly as you can. Once the girls are dressed, give your model some makeup to complete the look.

Use Different Mask to make girl more attractive and charming and don't forgot to use shower for her mask.You can choose between a wide variety of colors available for Eye Shades and shadows, Change eye color and you can even put blush on
Lemon That are used to make wedding girl’s eyes fresh and relax. Once your pony look super cute, change your princess’s hair from the catalog for a trendier look. So download this awesome game right away and start playing.
Remove The Pimple from The bride’s face.


Choose your favorite cute pink princess
-Give these princesses the best makeover to make her look more beautiful
-Give her an awesome spa treatment
-Different hair style to choose
-Choose different hair styles to make your pink princess look more trendy
-Play our game totally free and don’t forget to give us five star rating.
-Diffrerent dress to choose
-lots of makeup accessories like eye color,eye bro,neckless,dress,hair style,lipstick etc.
-New hair style/clothes /eye shades/earrings and more

It's a totally free game for girls and kids!
